fishery.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a part of the sea where fish are caught in large numbers
fishery.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: the agriculture, forest and fishery sectors of the economy
fishery.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a part of the sea where fish are caught as a business
fishery.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The Peruvian anchovy fishery is one of the largest in the world.
fishery.translation[1].definitions[2].de: the fishing industry. Fisheries is often used in the names of organizations involved in industrial fishing
fishery.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: The National Fisheries Institute is a trade group that represents seafood producers, processors, distributors and brokers.
